title: Primrose Storia - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Empires   Female Protagonist   Mysterious Family Background   Nobles   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: Hozumi Kariyasu   刈安ほづみ
description:
“No matter what happens, I will not give up. Because I am the hope of this world!”

Primrose, the princess of a country, is to be married off to the crown prince of an empire that was once her enemy, in order to make peace. However, due to a conspiracy by the empire, she is accused of a crime for which she has no reason and is about to be executed. At the same time, her homeland was destroyed, her father the king was killed, and her beloved sister went missing……

With the help of an honest knight in shining armor, a blunt young orc, a wise dwarven scholar, and an enigmatic monk boy, Primrose sets out to solve the mystery of her birth, reclaim her sister, rescue her captive fiancé, and bring peace to both nations!>
